snippet: In a speech at the Citadel Wednesday, Jeb Bush called for a United States-led global coalition, including troops on the ground, to take out the Islamic State “with overwhelming force.”
abstract: In a speech at the Citadel Wednesday, Jeb Bush called for a United States-led global coalition, including troops on the ground, to take out the Islamic State “with overwhelming force.”

headline.main: Jeb Bush Calls for Global Coalition and U.S. Ground Troops to Fight ISIS
headline.print_headline: Ground Forces Needed to Vanquish ISIS, Bush Tells Cadets at Citadel

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
